com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ads

Class AdPlaybackState

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ads.AdPlaybackState

  • public final class AdPlaybackState
extends Object
    Represents the structure of ads to play and the state of loaded/played ads.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int[] adCounts
      The number of ads in each ad group.
      int adGroupCount
      The number of ad groups.
      long[] adGroupTimesUs
      The times of ad groups, in microseconds.
      long adResumePositionUs
      The position offset in the first unplayed ad at which to begin playback, in microseconds.
      int[] adsLoadedCounts
      The number of ads loaded so far in each ad group.
      int[] adsPlayedCounts
      The number of ads played so far in each ad group.
      Uri[][] adUris
      The URI of each ad in each ad group.
      long contentDurationUs
      The content duration in microseconds, if known.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AdPlaybackState(long[] adGroupTimesUs)
      Creates a new ad playback state with the specified ad group times.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAdUri(int adGroupIndex, Uri uri)
      Adds an ad to the specified ad group.
      AdPlaybackState copy()
      Returns a deep copy of this instance.
      void playedAd(int adGroupIndex)
      Marks the last ad in the specified ad group as played.
      void playedAdGroup(int adGroupIndex)
      Marks all ads in the specified ad group as played.
      void setAdCount(int adGroupIndex, int adCount)
      Sets the number of ads in the specified ad group.
      void setAdResumePositionUs(long adResumePositionUs)
      Sets the position offset in the first unplayed ad at which to begin playback, in microseconds.

    • Field Detail

      • adGroupCount

        public final int adGroupCount
        The number of ad groups.

      • adGroupTimesUs

        public final long[] adGroupTimesUs
        The times of ad groups, in microseconds. A final element with the value C.TIME_END_OF_SOURCE indicates a postroll ad.

      • adCounts

        public final int[] adCounts
        The number of ads in each ad group. An element may be C.LENGTH_UNSET if the number of ads is not yet known.

      • adsLoadedCounts

        public final int[] adsLoadedCounts
        The number of ads loaded so far in each ad group.

      • adsPlayedCounts

        public final int[] adsPlayedCounts
        The number of ads played so far in each ad group.

      • adUris

        public final Uri[][] adUris
        The URI of each ad in each ad group.

      • contentDurationUs

        public long contentDurationUs
        The content duration in microseconds, if known. C.TIME_UNSET otherwise.

      • adResumePositionUs

        public long adResumePositionUs
        The position offset in the first unplayed ad at which to begin playback, in microseconds.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdPlaybackState

        public AdPlaybackState(long[] adGroupTimesUs)
        Creates a new ad playback state with the specified ad group times.
        Parameters:
        adGroupTimesUs - The times of ad groups in microseconds. A final element with the value C.TIME_END_OF_SOURCE indicates that there is a postroll ad.

    • Method Detail

        public AdPlaybackState copy()
        Returns a deep copy of this instance.

        Sets the number of ads in the specified ad group.

        public void addAdUri(int adGroupIndex,
                     Uri uri)
        Adds an ad to the specified ad group.

      • playedAd

        public void playedAd(int adGroupIndex)
        Marks the last ad in the specified ad group as played.

      • playedAdGroup

        public void playedAdGroup(int adGroupIndex)
        Marks all ads in the specified ad group as played.

      • setAdResumePositionUs

        public void setAdResumePositionUs(long adResumePositionUs)
        Sets the position offset in the first unplayed ad at which to begin playback, in microseconds.
